shared.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Michael Rhodes CS 340 Section 2 Dr. Woodfield

    • Constructor Summary

      Player()
      Default constructor.
      Player(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String name, int playerIndex, int playerID)
      Constructor that sets variables with values expected for a player just beginning a game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor. Sets variables with values expected for a player just beginning a game. Has null values for player specific variable like name and playerID.

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String color,
      java.lang.String name,
      int playerIndex,
      int playerID)
        Constructor that sets variables with values expected for a player just beginning a game. Expects parameters for player specific variables like name and playerID.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of this player
        name - The name of this player
        playerIndex - What place in the array this player is: 0-3. It determines their turn order
        playerID - The unique playerID. This is used to pick the client player apart from the others

    • Method Detail

      • canAfford

        public boolean canAfford(ResourceCard cost,
                PieceType type)
        Tells whether this player can afford to buy something with this cost
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        result = true iff the player has this many of the required resources and has the piece nessesary in his collection

      • pay

        public void pay(ResourceCard cost)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Pay resources to buy something
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canAfford() is true and something is being bought
        Post-Conditions
        the player has that many resources deducted

      • build

        public void build(PieceType type)
        Builds this thing. The player's piece collection is affected
        Parameters:
        type -
        Pre-Conditions
        canAfford(type) was true and this is a legal time to build
        Post-Conditions
        this piece is taken from the player's collection. In the case of a city, a settlement is also returned to the player's collection

      • recieve

        public void recieve(ResourceCard resource)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        this player recieves a resource
        Parameters:
        resource -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        The player has this resource added to their stash

      • getRobbed

        public ResourceCard getRobbed()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Robs a random resource from the player and returns it
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        The player has been legally selected to rob and has at least 1 resource
        Post-Conditions
        result = the resource that was deducted from this player to give to another

      • placeCity

        public void placeCity()
        Reduces number of cities player has left to play by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        The player must have at least 1 city left to play
        Post-Conditions
        The number of cities left to play is reduced by 1

      • discard

        public void discard(ResourceList resources)
        Removes a certain card(s) from the player's ResourceCardList
        Parameters:
        resources - A list of Resources to be discarded from ResourceCardList
        Pre-Conditions
        Number of cards to be discarded can not exceed number of cards in the ResourceCardList and player must have at least one card to discard
        Post-Conditions
        The number of cards in the ResourceCardList is reduced by the number of cards being discarded

      • playMonument

        public void playMonument()
        Increases the count of the number of monuments played by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        Player must have at least one DevCard of type monument in the DevCardList
        Post-Conditions
        One DevCard of type monument is removed from the DevCardList

      • playDevCard

        public void playDevCard()
        Reduces the count of DevCardList by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        Player must have at least one DevCard in the DevCardList and the type of the DevCard to be discarded must match the type of at least one DevCard in the DevCardList
        Post-Conditions
        The number of cards in the DevCardList is reduced by one

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad()
        Reduces number of roads player has left to play by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        The player must have at least 1 road left to play
        Post-Conditions
        The number of roads left to play is reduced by 1

      • placeSettlement

        public void placeSettlement()
        Reduces number of settlements player has left to play by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        The player must have at least 1 settlement left to play
        Post-Conditions
        The number of settlements left to play is reduced by 1

      • playSoldier

        public void playSoldier()
        Increases the count of the number of soldiers played by 1
        Pre-Conditions
        Player must have at least one DevCard of type soldier in the DevCardList
        Post-Conditions
        One DevCard of type soldier is removed from the DevCardList

      • discardDevCards

        public void discardDevCards(DevCardList devCards)
        Removes a certain card(s) from the player's DevCardList
        Parameters:
        devCards - A list of DevCardTypes to be discarded from DevCardList
        Pre-Conditions
        Number of cards to be discarded can not exceed number of cards in the DevCardList and player must have at least one card to discard
        Post-Conditions
        The number of cards in the DevCardList is reduced by the number of cards being discarded

      • discardResourceCards

        public void discardResourceCards(ResourceList resources)
        Removes a certain card(s) from the player's ResourceCardList
        Parameters:
        resources - A list of Resources to be discarded from ResourceCardList
        Pre-Conditions
        Number of cards to be discarded can not exceed number of cards in the ResourceCardList and player must have at least one card to discard
        Post-Conditions
        The number of cards in the ResourceCardList is reduced by the number of cards being discarded
